availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry E. Lewis (Louisville, Kentucky, chinaware merchant)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, chinaware merchant. Kentucky native. Son of Edmund H. Lewis. Married to Margaret Eleanor Clarke Lewis in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on June 1, 1843. Father of Eliza Lewis. Chinaware merchant in H.E. Lewis & Company in Louisville in 1858. Chinaware merchant in partnership with William A. Owens in H. E. Lewis & Company in Louisville in 1860. Chinaware merchant in partnership with William A. Owens and Edmund H. Lewis in H. E. Lewis & Company in Louisville from 1861 to 1864.
